name: P107
description:
The Poly Project has been building robotic war machines in hopes of selling them for a large military contract. One of these machines is P107, code named "Boulder" for its ability to roll at high speeds and ram into enemies. A test exercise has been arranged in order to display Boulder's capabilities.

This is a short game made for a Game Design class in which the assignment was to create a game using a player character who is a sphere. Boulder (along with the rest of the Poly line that does not show up in this game) are characters I created a long time ago and I figured I'd just go ahead and use him. This game was originally going to be much different, but the first concept turned out to be me biting off a bit more than I could chew as a beginner. Oh well, maybe next time!
